tolerance.description: The spatial cluster tolerance as a measure in the L2 Euclidean space.

voxel_leaf_size.description: The voxel leaf size of x and y.

min_points_number_per_voxel.description: The minimum number of points required per voxel.

min_cluster_size.description: The minimum number of points that a cluster needs to contain in order to be considered valid.

max_cluster_size.description: The maximum number of points that a cluster needs to contain in order to be considered valid.

input_frame.description: The reference frame for input data processing.

max_x.description: Maximum X coordinate for the low height crop box filter.

min_x.description: Minimum X coordinate for the low height crop box filter.

max_y.description: Maximum Y coordinate for the low height crop box filter.

min_y.description: Minimum Y coordinate for the low height crop box filter.

max_z.description: Maximum Z coordinate for the low height crop box filter.

min_z.description: Minimum Z coordinate for the low height crop box filter.

negative.description: Whether to invert the crop box filtering effect.
